name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Charlotte Matthews

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The computers were down when we arrived so we were given our keys without checking in. As a result we had to officially check in when we came back from our event. All in all the hotel is clean and comfortable, which is exactly what you would expect with a Fairfield Inn.
reviews.title: Good Stay

reviews.text: This was our second stay at the hotel and admittedly, the first time was great. This time, despite the hotel not looking very busy, we were given a room overlooking the parking lot and major road so it was incredibly noisy. Several times we approached the front desk and no one was there. When we got to our room both keys were not operational. My husband had to conduct several conference calls in the morning so we asked that the room be made up after 12 noon. When we returned at 6pm the room was not made. We left again for the evening and when we returned at 11pm the room still was not made.. We tried to print our boarding passes and there was no paper in the printer and then, when we got the paper, the ink cartridge was empty. All small inconveniences that added up to a poor experience.
reviews.title: Will Try The Best Western Next Time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our 4th stay at this Fairfield Inn in Charlotte and it was as excellent as we expected. The entire staff including Jamie at the front desk, the breakfast room attendants and the housekeeping staff could not be more friendly or helpful. We were welcomed back as if we were family returning home, and that is exactly the feeling you get. The suite we stayed in was spotless and inviting with everything working properly. Every part of the hotel is exceptionally clean, well maintained and very welcoming. A great room, more than adequate breakfast and a fantastic staff - what more could you want!
reviews.title: Consistenly Excellent

reviews.text: We can not imagine going up to Charlotte and not staying at this great hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: I have been traveling to Charlotte for business for the past 3 months and have stayed at this hotel almost every week. The rooms are always very clean and the staff are courteous and always go to the extra mile to make you feel welcome. I definitely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Value, Great Location

aka: Fairfield Inn And Suites Charlotte Matthews
description: Our brand new Fairfield Inn & Suites is located 10 minutes from the heart of Charlotte! Come visit us and enjoy our spacious rooms, contemporary design and friendly staff. Our hotel features complimentary breakfast and Wi-Fi, a unique outside patio equipped with a fireplace and grill, pool, fitness center, and jacuzzi. We also have a spacious meeting room that can cater to your next event! We hope to see you soon!
